 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוַר‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==make blind, blind== (original meaning of √ dubious; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עור‎</span> = ***dig*** (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> etc. ***cave***); [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>RŠJ xi, 67</sup> compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺר‎</span> ***skin***, whence ***blindness*** as cataract; — Aramaic adjective <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲוִיר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***blind***, Pa\`el <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַוַּר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = Hebrew Pi\`el; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be one-eyed***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be blind*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>995</sup>); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוֵּר‎</span> [[2Kgs.25.7|2Kgs 25:7]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֵי‎</span> ***put out the eyes of*** = [[Jer.39.7|Jer 39:7]] = [[Jer.52.11|Jer 52:11]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעַוֵּר‎</span> figurative, [[Exod.23.8|Exod 23:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) a bribe ***blindeth***, with accusative of person ([[BDB#Sam|⅏]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֵי‎</span>); [[Deut.16.19|Deut 16:19]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֵי‎</span>.
